PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1995-08291995-05-300,  ,  TC,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the HULL CONSTRUCTION REGULATIONS which convert the units of measure from imperial to metric, revoke Schedule III as well as provisions duplicated in the Marine Machinery Regulations, clarify the scope of the approval power vested in the Chairman of the Board of Steamships Inspection and incorporate the requirements of the International Convention for the Safety of Life at Sea, 1974 respecting double bottoms in passenger vessels.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1995-0254 Publication Date: 1995-06-14
Attachments
precis:
Amendments to the HULL CONSTRUCTION REGULATIONS which convert the units of
measure from imperial to metric, revoke Schedule III as well as provisions
duplicated in the Marine Machinery Regulations, clarify the scope of the
approval power vested in the Chairman of the Board of Steamships Inspection
and incorporate the requirements of the International Convention for the
Safety of Life at Sea, 1974 respecting double bottoms in passenger vessels.
